__TOC__

I would recommend following AsteriskOnUbuntu

This page is for specific anonolies with Feisty.

Building Zaptel module on Feisty will fail.

To build the module:

{{{## remove any old module sources (including zaptel)
sudo rm -rf /usr/src/modules/*

cd /usr/src
sudo tar jxvf zaptel.tar.bz2

wget http://librarian.launchpad.net/7076845/vzaphfc_main.patch -O ~/vzaphfc_main.patch

sudo patch modules/zaptel/vzaphfc/vzaphfc_main.c < ~/vzaphfc_main.patch

sudo tar cvjf zaptel.tar.bz2 modules/}}}
